plugins.name: notify-macos
plugins.description: macOS only: Sends native desktop notifications on task completion and approval requests

plugins.name: command-logger
plugins.description: Logs executed Bash commands to a cache file for history tracking

plugins.name: markdown-task-runner
plugins.description: Markdownファイルに定義されたタスクをサブエージェントで並列実行するワークフロー管理プラグイン

plugins.name: notify-wsl
plugins.description: WSL only: Sends Windows toast notifications on task completion and approval requests
